title: Robert Kennedy Jr: Bitcoin Is Inflation Offramp — BTC Is Key to Transactional Freedom
description: U.S. presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. (RFK Jr.) says bitcoin is the offramp from central banks’ “money printing machine.” Emphasizing that bitcoin is a “hard currency,” he stressed the importance of making the cryptocurrency available to the American public. “Transactional freedom is as important as freedom of speech and you only get that from […]

title: Is Google’s Trust & Safety Team on the Chopping Block Amidst AI Struggles?
description: In a move that highlights the intricacies of managing technological advancements while navigating organizational changes, Google, the tech giant under Alphabet Inc., is facing a conundrum regarding its trust and safety team. As the company initiates job cuts within this crucial division, affecting a small portion of its workforce, it simultaneously relies heavily on its […]

title: Pushd presale gains momentum, drawing attention from BTC, ADA communities

title: Is Ripple (XRP) the Ultimate Millionaire-Maker? IPO, SEC Settlement, XRPL Development and XRP ETF Say Yes
